content: Credit Card Asked by Sanjay JayaAsked on 21 Apr 2019Does anyone know if I can pay at an overseas supermarket with the converted funds in my Mighty FX debit card?Example: if I change money into AUD, can I swipe my card at Cole's or Aldi and avoid admin fees.1 answerAnswerBump0

Thaddeus Tan, Community Lead at SeedlyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Apr 2019Hi Sanjay, from the UOB wesbite it seems that you are able to avoid admin fees however the criteria is that you must transact in the local currency. 0 comments2
